name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter1)
description: Placed in Rune, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the East Gate of the inner castle, the western section of the outer castle, the Plaza or the guardian's location

description: Placed in Rune, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the outer castle, the East Gate of the inner castle, the Plaza or the guardian's location

name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter5)
